text: Indian singer, lyricist, and rapper Karan Aujla has released over forty-one singles as a lead artist and thirty-four as a lyricist. He has also featured in forty-five songs as a guest artist. Seven of his singles as a lead artist have featured in Global YouTube music chart, while fourteen have featured in UK Asian music chart by OCC. == Studio albums == {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- !
